Made from a quilted technical fabric with suede trims, Canada Goose's Crofton boots have front zip fastenings and flat rubber soles.

These sneakers from Valentino Garavani feature a black camouflage print with suede accents, Rockstud embellishments and a distinctive logo patch on the tongue.
Balenciaga adapts its Mold design with a supported rear for a fresh take on the innovative style. Made from molded rubber, these slip-on sandals have textured footbeds and cut-out sides.

The Journey boots from Canada Goose are made from leather and suited to rugged terrain.

product_name.product_name: Converse x DRKSHDW Turbodrk Hi sneakers
product_name.description: The Rick Owens DRKSHDW collaboration with Converse puts a new spin on the classic '70s Chucks. Made from waxed cotton twill for a shiny effect, the Turbodrk Hi sneakers are reimagined with signature squared rubber toe caps, elongated tongues, and toe vents.

These black suede sneakers from Lanvin have a sleek silhouette and patent cap-toe, resting on thick white rubber soles.
These black suede sneakers from Lanvin have a sleek silhouette and leather cap-toe, resting on thick black rubber soles.
Italian-made from smooth black leather, these Tabi high-ankle boots from Maison Margiela sport the label's signature split-toe design and stacked block heel.
These black suede sneakers from Lanvin have a sleek silhouette and leather cap-toe, resting on thick white rubber soles.
Italian-made from smooth black leather, these Tabi ankle boots from Maison Margiela sport the label's signature split-toe design and stacked block heel.

Designed with cutout uppers for water drainage, these black HOKA ONE ONE mountain sandals offer a secure Quick Lace lacing system, protective rubber toe caps, and rubber soles with multi-directional studs underneath for extra grip on uneven and wet terrains.
Made from leather, these black loafers from Tod's have a slip-on design, detailed with ties at the front and the label's signature rubber pebbles on the heel and soles.

Italian-made from smooth black leather, these Tabi loafers from Maison Margiela sport the label's signature split-toe design and collapsible heel counters.

These yellow mules from The North Face are made from recycled ripstop nylon uppers and have non-slip rubber soles for extra grip. Ideal to lounge in on-mountain retreats, they have a Thermoball ™ Eco insulation, synthetic filling, and a cozy fleece lining for warmth.

Minimalist and versatile, these sneakers from Acne Studios are made from calf leather and fasten via wide VELCRO® straps. They're detailed with subtle logo lettering and the house's iconic Face motif at the heel.
In white, these BB550 Court sneakers from New Balance sport soft leather uppers. In a comfortable fit, they feature the brand's recognizable "N" logo on the side and branding at the heel.

The Vectiv Taraval sneakers from The North Face are designed especially for hiking, thanks to their optimal grip and breathability. The uppers are made from a mix of faux leather and mesh, and the rubber soles have 4mm lugs.
Featuring suede uppers in a brown colorway, these Birkenstock 1774 mules have a molded cork midsole for a comfortable and lightweight step.
This update to Maison Margiela's iconic Replica sneakers sees the sleek silhouette in an all-black shade with leather uppers, suede trims and debossed logo on the tongue, atop a black rubber sole.

Made from smooth suede, these blue loafers from Tod's have a slip-on design detailed with the label's signature rubber pebbles on the heel and soles.

With supple suede uppers in brown, these Tod's desert boots are Italian-crafted with studded rubber soles, and the label's monogram embossed at the sole.

Made from smooth leather, the Journey black hiking boots from Canada Goose are designed for daily treks in alpine environments. They have a sturdy construction and feature ridged rubber soles for added grip.
Featuring soft suede uppers, Frescobol Carioca's Veluso espadrilles are set on classic woven jute soles.
Polish off workwear looks with the La Medusa loafers from Versace. Expertly crafted from smooth leather with a golden Medusa head, this pair is sleek and sophisticated.
The New Balance 550s are an upgraded version of a legacy design. Made with perforated leather uppers, mesh detailing, and elevated soles, these are court sneakers for a new era.
Norda's 001 trail running shoes are a seamless, ultra-lightweight style. This limited edition style is made from durable white fabric and set on high-performance flecked rubber soles.

For a fresh take on classic penny loafers, look to this style from Maison Margiela. They're crafted from smooth black leather with the brand's signature Tabi split-toe design.
Featuring suede uppers with shearling lining in black, these BIRKENSTOCK Men mules have a molded cork midsole for a comfortable and lightweight step.
Norda's 001 trail running shoes are a seamless, ultra-lightweight style. They are made from durable white fabric and set on high-performance rubber soles.
The Kaha 2 Low GTX running shoes are a versatile high-performance pair made from nubuck leather uppers with a GORE-TEX® membrane. They are set atop VIBRAM® MegaGrip lugsoles for excellent traction.

Calling to mind the chunky styles of an earlier era, the MA-1 sneakers from Amiri have wide laces and oversized tongues. Made from panels of leather, the design's mesh inserts, and perforated toeboxes ensure airflow.

Jil Sander reimagines the classic Chelsea boots with this design, featuring chunky rubber soles and elasticated gussets that wrap around the ankle. Crafted from black leather, the style has rounded toes and a pull tab.

Loewe's Anagram logo was designed by Spanish artist Vicente Vela as a quadruple-L insignia. The motif appears in distressed form on the sidewalls of the Flow sneakers, offset by exaggerated wrap soles and toe caps.

Distressed sneakers have become somewhat of a brand signature for Balenciaga, and the 3XL style is no exception. The mesh and faux leather paneling have a worn-in effect, while chunky soles give this pair a lengthened look.
Balenciaga's Runner sneakers are made from panels of mesh and technical nylon. Featuring squared toes, they have logo embroidery on the tongues.

Modeled after traditional tennis shoes, Christian Louboutin’s Louis Junior sneakers lend signature sophistication to your every look. Crafted from white leather with tonal Loubispikes, this low-top pair is finished with brand-iconic red soles.

Balenciaga's instantly recognizable Speed sneakers receive an update featuring thick, fragmented and ultra-articulated rubber soles, and breathable fabric uppers in taupe.

Modeled after traditional tennis shoes, Christian Louboutin’s Louis Junior sneakers lend signature sophistication to your every look. Crafted from suede with tonal Loubispikes, this low-top pair is finished with brand-iconic red soles.

A sculptural sneaker, Balenciaga’s HD style is perfect for tough terrain with its lightweight fabrication and sporty aesthetic. A trekking-inspired design, it features grooved and ridged outsoles and midsoles for grip and perforations for breathability.

Detailed with graffiti-inspired logo lettering on the heel counters, slip into Balenciaga's crowd-stopping footwear. These slip-on sneakers have a distressed cotton canvas construction with elasticated side tabs and rubber soles with worn-in detailing.

Now a house signature, Burberry's Vintage Check pattern was originally used as trench coat lining in 1920s. Appearing on the tongues, these mesh low-top sneakers have leather heel counters and rubberized logos.
Christian Louboutin's Hot Cross slides are an elevated essential for warm-weather styling. They feature crossed cotton straps, jute-trimmed soles, and subtle logo detailing.

Add the 3XL sneakers from Balenciaga to your rotation. Made from layers of mesh, the leather-free sneakers are a stand-out silhouette with logo-embossed details and an additional pair of laces around the uppers.
Made from suede, these navy loafers from Tod's have a slip-on design detailed with the label's signature rubber pebbles on the heel and soles.
The HD mules showcase Balenciaga's dedication to boundary-breaking fashion. Made from durable rubber, this style has a sporty silhouette that's embossed with logo lettering and size information.
Christian Louboutin's Hot Cross slides are an elevated essential for warm-weather styling. They feature crossed cotton straps, jute-trimmed soles, and subtle logo detailing.
Alexander McQueen's low-top sneakers are crafted from leather with oversized rubber soles. An iconic style from the brand, this pair is finished with tonal laces and comes in a refreshing green hue.

Saint Laurent's esteemed elegance extends to a streamlined collection of sneakers, spotlighted by this low-top silhouette. This calfskin style has gold foil lettering on the sidewalls, curved insets on the rubber soles, and embossed tongues.

At once iconic and understated, Valentino Garavani's VLogo carries the Maison's legacy of elegance. The motif appears in polished gold-tone metal on the grained calfskin construction of these slip-on loafers, complete with traditional pebble soles.

At once iconic and understated, Valentino Garavani's VLogo carries the Maison's legacy of elegance. The motif appears in tonal metal on the polished calfskin construction of these chunky loafers, complete with lugged rubber soles.

In a black colorway, the Rockrunner sneakers from Valentino Garavani feature mesh uppers with suede and leather inserts. They're detailed with branded tongues and signature Rockstud details in rubber at the heels.

product_name.product_name: 360 LP Flexy Walk Wish® wool sneakers
product_name.description: The 360 LP Flexy Walk sneakers from Loro Piana are defined by their sock-like construction and chevron uppers. The style is made from  Wish® wool - derived from Merino sheep bred in Australia and New Zealand.
Finished with net uppers, these low-top sneakers from Golden Goose are made in Italy, featuring beige rubber soles, red counters, and a white leather star on either side.

product_name.product_name: x Adidas Stan Smith leather sneakers
product_name.description: Named after the tennis all-star, the Stan Smith sneakers merge Balenciaga's contemporary edge and Adidas' sportswear expertise. Made from supple leather, the low-top style features a perforated take on the iconic 3-Stripe and worn-effect rubber soles.

These sneakers from Valentino Garavani are a versatile option for everyday wear. They're made from durable nylon with tonal detailing, including leather trims and iconic stud embellishments at the heel.
Set on chunky rubber soles, these suede loafers from Christian Louboutin feature studded counters.
An elevated option for warmer days, these espadrilles from Valentino Garavani have canvas uppers. The black pair is topped with tonal Vlogo and Roman Stud hardware.

Made in Italy from supple leather with a contrasting navy stripe and partially concealed laces, these sleek white sneakers from Valentino Garavani are enhanced with the label's iconic studs at the heel.
Lemaire's suede boots have a Western-inspired silhouette with curved toplines and decorative stitching. With welted leather soles and wax-coated uppers, these boots are built to last.

A true classic, these loafers from Gucci feature the label's iconic golden Horsebit detail over the bridges. The slip-on pair is made in Italy from supple leather and features tonal stitching throughout.
First introduced in 2018, the multi-layered, faux leather and mesh uppers of these black Balenciaga sneakers are made with a double lace-up design, set on chunky rubber soles.

Berluti's Shadow sneakers are constructed from a knit fabric with leather detailing. A padded insole provides increased support and decorative lacing accents the slip-on design.
With beige cashmere uppers and off-white rubber soles, these loafers from Loro Piana have a slip-on design for a casual silhouette.
Made from smooth leather, Balenciaga's Cosy slippers feature the label's iconic hardware on the uppers.

The Varsimule Bizz slides from Christian Louboutin are crafted from supple suede to a classic silhouette and feature iconic red soles for instant recognition. This style is finished with silver-toned logo hardware on the straps.

These slides are made of tactile suede with articulated vamp straps that are embellished with plaques. Finished with Christian Louboutin's iconic red soles, this pair makes every step you take a sophisticated one.

The Gucci Kawaii collection sees iconic house codes enriched by Angela Nguyen's colorful and playful illustrations. Enriching the Tennis 1977 silhouette, the pair is crafted from GG Supreme canvas and accented with Web Stripe detailing.

Step into Zegna's sophisticated vision with the Udine Derby shoes. This polished calfskin style has elasticated panels for an easy slip-on fit, resting on contemporary layered soles that are made from rubber.

With an almond-shaped toe, these Siena Flex classic Derby shoes from Zegna are Italian-crafted from supple leather. The design features a formal lace-up detail and is finished with sleek rubber soles.
Givenchy's City Sport sneakers are poised for everyday wear. They're made from smooth calfskin leather with a 4G metal emblem on the tongue and contrast color heel counters.

product_name.product_name: Gucci Kawaii Web canvas slide sandals
product_name.description: The Gucci Kawaii collection sees iconic house codes enriched by Angela Nguyen's colorful and playful illustrations. These slider sandals are made from GG Supreme canvas and sit atop molded rubber soles for optimal comfort.

Each Brunello Cucinelli design is handmade in Solomeo, a medieval hamlet whose art and traditions are woven into the house's every fiber. These "washed suede" loafers boast a velvety quality that's achieved by hand buffing.
Moncler brings a refreshing take on everyday slides with the Lilo pair. They feature thick, lined rubber soles and the signature logo embossed on the top and back.

Burberry's iconic Check pattern originated in the '20s as a trench coat lining. These slides appear with ergonomically molded rubber soles, embossed logos to the midsoles, and thick straps with mesh overlays.
Moncler applies its expert craftsmanship to the Basile slides, detailed with the French flag across the strap – an homage to the brand’s home country.
Made from grained leather, the black Triple Stitch sneakers from Zegna feature elasticated laces for a slip-on design, and sit atop rubber soles.
Embrace effortlessly cool styles like the Varsicool slides from Christian Louboutin. Made from grained leather, this slip-on pair has the brand's CL logo debossed on the uppers.
A testament to streamlined design, Givenchy's TK-360 sneakers are made from breathable, perforated mesh and on ridged soles for optimum traction.

The Cloudventure running shoes combine the best of On's performance-driven Swiss engineering and Loewe's dedication to craftsmanship. The lightweight style is made from canvas and mesh with a Missiongrip™ rubber sole and a windproof membrane.
